document_title: Dry joints: Causes, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Arthritis is a condition in which the joints do not produce or do not produce enough lubricant when the articular cartilage functions. This leads to symptoms such as dry and stiff joints, a cracking sound when moving the joint... Joints that are often dry are the hip joint, shoulder joint, arm joint, especially the knee joint. (first)
subsection_title: kho khop.json. What is dry joints?
subsection_data:
kho khop.json. What is dry joints?
Arthritis is a condition in which the joints do not produce or do not produce enough lubricant when the articular cartilage functions. This leads to symptoms such as dry and stiff joints, a cracking sound when moving the joint... Joints that are often dry are the hip joint, shoulder joint, arm joint, especially the knee joint. (first)
